soot.jbco.jimpleTransformations

Class ClassRenamer

  • java.lang.Object
    • soot.Transformer
      • soot.SceneTransformer
        • soot.jbco.jimpleTransformations.ClassRenamer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IJbcoTransform

    public class ClassRenamer
extends SceneTransformer
implements IJbcoTransform
    SceneTransformer that renames class names as well as packages.
    Since:
    26-Jan-2006
    Author:
    Michael Batchelder, Pavel Nesterovich

      • isRemovePackages

        public boolean isRemovePackages()
        Checks if transformer must remove package from fully qualified class name.
        Returns:
        true if ClassRenamer removes packages from fully qualified class name; false otherwise

      • setRemovePackages

        Sets flag indicating that transformer must remove package from fully qualified class name.
        Parameters:

      • isRenamePackages

        public boolean isRenamePackages()
        Checks if transformer must rename package in fully qualified class name.
        Returns:

      • getOrAddNewName

        public String getOrAddNewName(String packageName,
                              String className)
        Generates new unique name that have not existed before and mapping for it or gets already generated name if one was generated before.
        Parameters:
        packageName - the package where class is located. Can be null
        className - the class name (without package) to create mapping for. Can be null
        Returns:
        the new unique name

      • getPackageName

        public static String getPackageName(String fullyQualifiedClassName)
        Extracts package name from class name.
        Parameters:
        fullyQualifiedClassName - the fully qualified class name. Can be null
        Returns:
        package name or null when class name is null, no '.' in the name, or package name is '.'

      • getClassName

        public static String getClassName(String fullyQualifiedClassName)
        Extracts class name from fully qualified name.
        Parameters:
        fullyQualifiedClassName - the fully qualified class name. Can be null
        Returns:
        class name or null when class name is null, no '.' in the name
